articles.content: A courier at the heart of James Stunt's £266million money laundering enterprise used his hat as a glove, gripped notes with his knuckles and stashed a secret 'code word' in his sock to avoid being li… [+9902 chars]

articles.author: Harry Howard
articles.title: How Maradona's 'Hand of God' goal sparked feud between referee and assistant - Daily Mail
articles.description: When Diego Maradona scored his 'Hand of God' goal in the 1986 World Cup, referee Ali Bin Nasser his Bulgarian assistant Bogdan Dotchev exchanged hesitant glances.
articles.content:
They were the men who could have changed history - if only they had disallowed the world's most famous goal in front of more than 100,000 fans. 
When Diego Maradona scored his infamous 'Hand of God'… [+12825 chars]
